name: cookingTemperature_getValue
description: This function is used to retrieve the current temperature of a specified compartment in a cooking appliance.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to get the temperature.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: A group action identifier if applicable.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The specific compartment within the device to get the temperature.
